questions.question: What is the purpose of Angular CLI?
questions.answer1: To create and manage Angular projects
questions.correctAnswer: To create and manage Angular projects

questions.question: What is a component in Angular?
questions.answer3: A building block of an Angular application
questions.correctAnswer: A building block of an Angular application

questions.question: What is two-way data binding in Angular?
questions.answer1: Binding data in one direction only
questions.answer2: Binding data in two different components
questions.answer3: Binding data in both directions between the view and the model
questions.answer4: Binding data in the server and client
questions.correctAnswer: Binding data in both directions between the view and the model

questions.question: What is Spring Boot?
questions.answer3: A framework for building Java-based web applications
questions.correctAnswer: A framework for building Java-based web applications

questions.question: What is the purpose of the @SpringBootApplication annotation in a Spring Boot application?
questions.answer1: It marks a class as a Spring Bean
questions.answer3: It enables the automatic configuration of the Spring context
questions.correctAnswer: It enables the automatic configuration of the Spring context

questions.question: How does Spring Boot simplify the configuration of data sources?
questions.answer1: By requiring extensive XML configuration files
questions.answer2: By providing sensible defaults and requiring minimal configuration
questions.answer3: By eliminating the need for data sources in applications
questions.answer4: By relying on external configuration tools
questions.correctAnswer: By providing sensible defaults and requiring minimal configuration

questions.question: What is the purpose of the @RestController annotation in Spring Boot?
questions.answer2: It handles HTTP requests and produces RESTful responses
questions.answer4: It establishes a connection to a database
questions.correctAnswer: It handles HTTP requests and produces RESTful responses

questions.question: How does Spring Boot simplify the deployment of applications?
questions.answer1: By providing a cloud hosting service
questions.answer2: By generating executable JAR or WAR files
questions.answer4: By outsourcing deployment to third-party vendors
questions.correctAnswer: By generating executable JAR or WAR files

questions.question: What is a block in a blockchain composed of?
questions.answer3: Transactions and a reference to the previous block
questions.correctAnswer: Transactions and a reference to the previous block

questions.question: What is the process of adding a new block to the blockchain called?
What consensus algorithm is commonly used in blockchain networks like Bitcoin?
What is a public key in blockchain cryptography used for?
questions.answer4: Identifying a user on the network
